1.1.0.en: Added heating curve offset to advanced settings and heating offset to advanced settings

1.2.0.en: heat addition, calculated supply line and supply line temp

1.2.1.en: Bug fix for newly added features

1.4.0.en: Compressor and electric addition status capabilities added

1.4.1.en: Bugfix and remove status_electric_addition for now,since it didn't work from API-side

1.4.5.en: Added support for s-series heat pumps

1.5.1.en: Removed operational mode from advanced settings for now, due to compability issues

1.5.4.en: Added request queue helper to bundle api-requests. This should help timeouts when dealing with flows

1.6.0.en: Added several flow cards and implemented a request-queue helper system that bundles multiple requests based on timing thresholds, reducing timeout errors that previously occurred when the heatpump responded too slowly to individual sequential requests.

1.6.1.en: Added power delta calculation for s-series heatpumps

1.6.2.en: Bug fix for F730 devices as well as dependency updates

1.6.3.en: Bug fix for Supply temp on f730

1.7.1.en: Added air velocity sensor (parameter 42782) - Now showing air velocity measurements for F-Series heat pumps. As well as added power internal additional heat (parameter 43084) - Track current power usage of the internal electric heater (starts at 0.5kW, increases 0.5kW per 100 degree minutes)

1.7.2.en: Added approximate energy tracking (meter_power kWh) for F-Series, calculated from 3-phase 400V current measurements. Note: this is approximate since F-series can't directly measure energy tracking
